game.name: The Bubblebound Realm
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A ghostly invasion forces the villagers into the unknown. Hunger and fear eat away at their last hope. As a Bubble Engineer, you return to the danger zone to recover lost ancient tech and protect them. But… where did these ghosts really come from?
